scene_metadata.title: Cosmic Necessity
scene_metadata.philosophical_depth: the cosmos expressing itself through change

dialogue.text: You being anything else would contradict the machinery of the universe. You are an expression of change because the cosmos doesn't do stillness.

psychological_notes: The shift to cosmic perspective removes the personal from identity questions. We are not separate from the universe choosing to change, but the universe's own process of change expressing itself through us. This reframes psychological struggles as cosmic necessities.
philosophical_underpinning: Individual identity is the universe's way of experiencing change from a particular perspective
therapeutic_direction: Liberation through recognizing oneself as cosmic process rather than isolated entity
